name: Python 3.12 with PostgreSQL
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && mkdir -p ~/pgdata && if [ ! -f ~/pgdata/PG_VERSION ]; then initdb -D ~/pgdata; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'postgres -D ~/pgdata -p 5432 -k /tmp > ~/postgres.log 2>&1 & sleep 3 && psql -h localhost -U vscode -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS email_verification_db;" || true'
